, Netherlands, , Job Family Group, , Downstream Supply Chain, , , , Regular, , , , November 4, 2020, , , , Downstream, , , , Experienced Professionals, , , , , , Shell aspires to be a global leader in providing cleaner energy solutions to consumers Trading  Supply is integral to this aspiration and is working with partners in the Downstream to grow its position as a market leader in BioFuels by securing a sizeable and sustainable portfolio of active feedstock positions through our established Global Trading Network, the development of new supply infrastructure while ensuring the business continues to evolve with biofuels legislation, international trade policies and market developments, , , , As Supply Chain Development Manager to Shells Biofuels division, you will design, develop and implement a global aggregation strategy for a world scale supply chain of HVO feedstock into Shells growing HVO manufacturing footprint in Europe Part of your role will also include supply chain network design, selection of strategically located feedstock aggregation terminals in key feedstock sourcing markets and the development of strategic partnerships with logistic service providers to ensure Shell can tap into the widest range of HVO feedstock opportunities, while minimizing total delivered cost of supply to the production facilities, , You will also aid the delivery and implementation of a portfolio of specific opportunities for aggregation terminals in Europe and across the globe, in compliance with all relevant local and international laws  regulations Together with your design and operationalization of the aggregation strategy, this will provide Shell with a competitive edge and also act as a catalyst for growth in currently less developed feedstock markets, , , , , , Were keen to hear from professionals who have a bachelors or masters degree, or equivalent work experience, , , , Theres never been a more exciting time to work at Shell Everyone here is helping solve one of the biggest challenges facing the world today bringing the benefits of energy to everyone on the planet, whilst managing the risks of climate change, , Join us and youll add your talent and imagination to a business with the power to shape the future  whether by investing in renewables, exploring new ways to store energy or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently, , , , To power progress together, we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard Here are just some of the ways were nurturing an inclusive environment  one where you can express your ideas, extend your skills and reach your potential, , , , Combine our creative, collaborative environment and global operations with an impressive range of benefits and joining Shell becomes an inspired career choice, , Were huge advocates for career development Well encourage you to try new roles and experience new settings By pushing people to reach their potential, we frequently help them find skills they never knew they had, or make career moves they never thought possible, , , , , , Please note We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell that may be associated with your personal data and informs you that your personal data may be transferred to Royal DutchShell Group companies around the world The Shell Group and its approved recruitment consultants will never ask you for a fee to process or consider your application for a career with Shell Anyone who demands such a fee is not an authorised Shell representative and you are strongly advised to refuse any such demand Shell is an Equal Opportunity Employer

Job Title: Volunteer: Rainwater Harvesting and Water Security Project in Fiji
Industry: ['Marketing and Advertising', 'Nonprofit Organization Management', 'Hospital & Health Care']
Job Description: Location Dawasmu, Fiji, , Duration 212 weeks commitment, , Start Dates This project is ongoing and you can join whenever suits you best, depending upon availability, ,  from 1,295 GBP for 2 weeks, , Fee Includes all food, accommodation, predeparture  incountry support, orientation and all project related activities, , Does not Include flights, airport pickup, travel insurance, personal spending, visas and vaccinations, , This opportunity is designed to give you the contacts and experience to help further your career You are not replacing any member of staff, but helping alongside them, whilst learning new skills, , , , Introduction, , On this program, you could be taking part in a range of activities, from installation of waste management and rainwater harvesting systems, assessing and enhancing sustainable agriculture by building veggie gardens, interacting with villagers, all while making lifelong friends from a range of cultural and geographical backgrounds, , Depending on the needs of the community at that time, there may also be the opportunity to work on more specific water management initiatives such as freshwater management, water security amp water and sanitation hygiene Some of the core focuses include health and nutrition, educational empowerment, environmental management, water, sanitation amp hygiene initiatives, along with the activities mentioned previously, , Daily Life, , This project promotes the sustainable and progressive empowerment of communities through direct grass roots level interaction Our goal is to help these communities to live healthy, sustainable, and environmentally aware lives through the successful management of natural resources and the implementation of applicable environmental technology It is only through our collaboration with the communities that we can be successful on a large scale, , You can expect to be involved in any of the following focuses dependent on community needs at the time, , All our projects involve consultative and educational workshops with community members, ,  Most villages in Fiji rely on burning or burying household waste as there are no waste disposal services available in such remote areas We have therefore designed and are constructing recycling points throughout the district for people to use as an alternative, ,  Both men and women expressed an interest in bettering their understanding of how to grow particular foods to help feed their families, ,  Following on from the Kitchen Garden workshops, volunteers have also begun developing workshops focusing on nutrition, ,  Members of the community also expressed an interest in the following workshops, which have been tabled for future development including child development, climate change, plantation farming and small business skills If you have expertise in any of these areas, or special knowledge, please let us know as we strive to utilise volunteers and maximise their effectiveness when on the project, , You can also expect to get involved in the following, , all information above is subject to change Please check the most up to date information on the Global Nomadic website when applying

transitie naar een duurzame energievoorziening en het behalen van klimaatdoelstellingen De werkzaamheden variren door de grote diversiteit aan projecten en opdrachtgevers waardoor jouw werk elke dag naar een circulaire economie in Nederland, Dit doe je door de vaak complexere opgaven van onze opdrachtgevers inzichtelijk en concreet te maken en het op innovatieve wijze aanbieden van de juiste handvatten om, ook echt met de transitie naar een circulaire economie aan de slag te gaan Zo bouw je samen met ons aan een duurzame toekomst en draag je direct bij aan onze missie Enhancing Society Together, , Jij bent voor ons het gezicht in de markt voor afvalmanagement en behalve dat onze opdrachtgevers prettig met je samenwerken weet je onderscheidende en winnende offertes uit te schrijven Iets wat je teamleden erg waarderen omdat je nieuwe uitdagingen voor hen binnen haalt die bijdragen aan hun persoonlijke groei en ontwikkeling, , Om dit te realiseren ga je , , kunt meedraaien in psychologen, , ontwikkeling, , organisatie neerzetten als innovatieve speler die vorm geeft aan de transitie van, afval naar een circulaire economie in Nederland, , , , Natuurlijk ontvang je bij ons Job Title: Volunteer: Marine + Community Development in the Philippines
Industry: ['Marketing and Advertising', 'Nonprofit Organization Management', 'Hospital & Health Care']
Job Description: Location Malapascua, Philippines, , Duration From 2 weeks, , Cost from 1,065 Euros  enquire with us when applying, , Fee Includes all food, accommodation, predeparture  incountry support, orientation and all project related activities, , Does not Include flights, airport pickup, travel insurance, personal spending, visas and vaccinations, , This opportunity is designed to give you the contacts and experience to help further your career You are not replacing any member of staff, but helping alongside them, whilst learning new skills, ,  first Friday of each month, , , , We invite you to be a part of our project Our aim is to promote capacity building and communitybased marine resources management as a way to alleviate poverty, whilst increasing the resilience of coastal communities and raise awareness about marine conservation, , Our organisation is committed to working alongside our local community in Malapascua, and guide them towards a healthy and sustainable future, mainly by in identifying innovative ways to protect their marine environment whilst having a positive economic impact  a winwin outcome, , We seek to educate through Research, namely we run expeditions to teach volunteers and local trainees excellent diving standards, educate them to the marine environment, and get their help in collecting underwater data, , By increasing community resilience, we work alongside the community to identify alternative sources of income, support sustainable fishing and the development and implementation of Disaster Risk Reduction programs, , You will help us to support capacity building projects, using tools such as Integrated People Health and Environment PHE programs, social entrepreneurship, education, which have been shown to be successful tools against poverty alleviation and towards successful local management of environmental resources, , , , , , , Right now is a particularly exciting time for our survey work We have been working closely with the relevant local government departments and are currently involved in the ongoing efforts to create a new network of Marine Protected Areas in the local municipality Our survey work of which you would be part has been essential in informing this process and allowing it to move forward, , Another recent development is the establishment of a fish monitoring programme on nearby Monad Shoal This world famous dive site offers regular encounters with thresher sharks and is undoubtedly what puts Malapascua on the map Working in partnership with local stakeholders, we are providing the technical assistance and required training to establish a longterm monitoring programme on the site that will provide the much needed information for the ongoing management efforts, , , Daily Life, , It is the intention that these projects are ongoing, rather than just run on a temporary basis As such, it is hard to say with any certainty what projects you could be involved in What we would add though is thatif you have any particular areas of interest or expertise, we would make every effort to accommodate these in your expedition We really do believe in trying to make use of volunteers varied skill sets and expertise that they bring with them on their stay with us, , , , Having completed the dive training if needed, you will start the Science training This is truly the focus of the expedition Here you will learn about the wonders of the underwater world One of the most consistent feedbacks we have received from previous volunteers, even the ones who have been divers for a long time, is how amazing it is to learn about all that you see on a dive Not just fish, but the myriad of living creatures you find under the water It can add a whole new dimension to SCUBA diving that you may have never experienced before, , It is no problem if you don t have any relevant background knowledge in marine biology and underwater surveying All the training you need is provided by our Science Officer on site Furthermore, we do make every effort to get you prepared in advance by sending you some learning materials that you can study at home before you join us, , We have a core survey programme that will be the priority for all arriving volunteers We currently have over twenty monitoring sites that are periodically visited and this initial training gets you ready to conduct real surveys at one of these locations, , all information above is subject to change Please check the most up to date information on the Global Nomadic website when applying

Job Description: Vacature van Waste4ME BV, locatie Moerdijk, , Internship Or Graduation Assignment Description, , The database specialist design, implement, update, modify, and maintain the system heshe put in place to meet the needs of Waste4ME They consult with other management employees to discuss computer equipment purchases such as hardware and determine requirements for various software programs They might also direct training of personnel who use company databases regularly, Waste4ME performs regular analysis on the pyrolysis input and output several waste streams in and pyrolytic oil, gas and char out plus loads of operating parameters from different subsystems and thus needs a database system in order for the team to be able to find data quickly and efficiently Therefore, the focus is set on a database design that is usable and safe for the companys specific database application or a set of applications, In summary, the person we are looking for will have a knowledge of database principles and how they apply to the real world You will be designing and building database systems that are highly available and must be confident within all stages of our business, from initial requirements analysis, data modelling and as a great optional asset, through to automated reporting from compiled and selected data, , , , The company Waste4ME positions itself at the intersection of different industries Waste4ME is pioneering the plastic recycling industry by giving previously incinerated plastic waste a second life Our company turns a global environmental problem into lowcarbon products and valuable petrochemical products Our solution also allows implementing sustainable waste disposal techniques and bridge intermittent energy supply in remote locations WER unit waste reducer energy generator is a mobile waste management tool based on pyrolysis technology It is designed for tackling waste, where recycling is not feasible and where waste disposal is an issue Thanks to its mobile nature, WER allows to avoid transport costs, electricity cost, gas boiler cost and gas for a boiler, Working at Waste4ME, As you gain knowledge and experience in different sectors you can grow within the company Our team mentality is straightforward and product oriented You have the freedom to plan your work and set your own milestones in line with the company goals Additionally, if you want to suggest a different topic and you think you can add value make a proposal including milestones and catch our attention We are a growing company and are looking for people with ideas and the mentality to execute selected ideas, , , , , , , , , For the position we are looking for the following background, , , For the practical execution of the work and filling in with focuses on the analytical part eg market analysis, financial analysis, business case and the process and project management side of MA as well as within the Format, Footprint and RE FFRE pillar This level requires an academic masters degree with at least three to four years of experience in a relevant area The job interacts independently with a variety of mostly internal stakeholders and is guided by senior SD managers The Strategy  Development team is based in SchipholOost and principal tasks include Supporting the strategy and growth agenda of BME Identifying organic and nonorganic growth opportunities Originating and executing of MA deals Supporting of integration activities 100day plan Developing and implementing new Formats and optimising the Footprint including the management of the owned and leased Real Estate portfolio The purpose of the job is to support the team of Strategy  Development through analysis and execution support of MA transactions bolton acquisitions, new platforms, disposals, in order to help the business to execute their growth ambitions and create value through MA The role also has an ongoing coordination and tracking responsibility for the FFRE initiatives The role builds relationships across business stakeholders and supports execution of the strategic planning process as required, , Key Tasks and Responsibilities, , , , Conduct relevant market studies and regularly consult industry experts, , , , Gather, analyse, and present information of potential acquisition targets and various profitability scenarios, , , , Participate in execution of MA projects, evaluate targets, draft offer letters, supportcoordinate due diligences and prepareparticipate in negotiations, build relationships with business stakeholders, , , , Prepare, develop, and support proposals for acquisition including valuation, risk analysis, synergy potential, cost etc, , , , Develop post integration plans for new acquisitions together with the business leaders, support, and monitor execution in the first 100 days, , , , Develop and share business development methodologies and tools, such as valuation models and make them available across BME, , , , On an ongoing basis follow up and report on the progress and execution of the FFRE initiatives, , Key Functional Competencies, , Strong leadership  analytical skills Tactful  pragmatic Proactive  sensitive to interpersonal and organizational aspects Ambitious  handson mentality A bridgebuilder who can convince and get people on board Strong analytic skills combined with a strategic mindset High level of drive with an attention to detail Ability to learn quickly Agile and flexible A strong team player, , Education and Experience, , Strong academic background Masters in a numerical discipline Business, Finance, Econometrics, Engineering, etc Three to four years of work experience, preferably in an international matrix environment Investment banking, Corporate Finance  Strategy experience is a plus Extensive experience with Excel and presentation tools how to build a story Excellent communication verbal and written skills in English and preferably German Dutch and French General knowledge of the construction industry is plus, but not a requirement

Job Title: Volunteer: Alternative Livelihoods and Community Empowerment in Fiji
Industry: ['Marketing and Advertising', 'Nonprofit Organization Management', 'Hospital & Health Care']
Job Description: Location Dawasmu, Fiji, , Duration 212 weeks commitment, , Start Dates This project is ongoing and you can join whenever suits you best, depending upon availability, ,  from 1,295 GBP for 2 weeks, , Fee Includes all food, accommodation, predeparture  incountry support, orientation and all project related activities, , Does not Include flights, airport pickup, travel insurance, personal spending, visas and vaccinations, , This opportunity is designed to give you the contacts and experience to help further your career You are not replacing any member of staff, but helping alongside them, whilst learning new skills, , , , Introduction, , By joining this project, you will team up with other participants to contribute to various community development initiatives and be offered the opportunity to assist with alternative income generation strategies for members of local communities Your tasks may also include working with the locals in assessing the needs of the village, monitoring waste management systems and creating recycling depots, to name just a few, , Before initiating any projects, research is conducted and community groups and leaders are consulted to determine the relevant issues that need to be addressed Participants work on various different projects depending on when they join the program If there is a need at that time, you may also have the opportunity to work with the villagers on alternate ways to generate income, , This program works to assist villagers in creating systems to address areas such as waste management and recycling There may also be the opportunity, depending on the needs of the community at that time, to assist them with learning how to adapt their livelihoods in response to the changing pressures on traditional life, as a result of ongoing environmental and social change We focus on empowering communities by actively engaging important issues involved with the factors that inform their quality of life, such as access to fresh water, access to education, food security, and alternative options for income generation In this way, participants collaborate with us to genuinely make a positive contribution to both the landscape and ecosystem in the region, , You will effectively help to research, support, create and maintain community development initiatives and will be provided with the opportunity to work on income generating initiatives for the locals Some tasks may include assisting in creating handicrafts made from recycled materials, researching new project development possibilities, determining where there is a need and if the community can do anything to supply in this need, identifying and supporting access to new markets, and developing vegetable garden projects, , Daily Life, , This project promotes the sustainable and progressive empowerment of communities through direct grass roots level interaction Our goal is to help these communities to live healthy, sustainable, and environmentally aware lives through the successful management of natural resources and the implementation of applicable environmental technology It is only through our collaboration with the communities that we can be successful on a large scale, , You can expect to be involved in any of the following focuses dependent on community needs at the time, , All our projects involve consultative and educational workshops with community members, ,  Most villages in Fiji rely on burning or burying household waste as there are no waste disposal services available in such remote areas We have therefore designed and are constructing recycling points throughout the district for people to use as an alternative, ,  Both men and women expressed an interest in bettering their understanding of how to grow particular foods to help feed their families, ,  Following on from the Kitchen Garden workshops, volunteers have also begun developing workshops focusing on nutrition, ,  Members of the community also expressed an interest in the following workshops, which have been tabled for future development including child development, climate change, plantation farming and small business skills If you have expertise in any of these areas, or special knowledge, please let us know as we strive to utilise volunteers and maximise their effectiveness when on the project, , all information above is subject to change Please check the most up to date information on the Global Nomadic website when applying

different way on how to get to the costumersend users The gas is being used inhouse, but the ashes and oil are being transported away These materials should be weighed, checked on contents and relevant paperwork needs to be filled in Also, the way that the ashes and oil are transported and all the legislation that is involved with it needs to be researched As an intern your task is to help set up this process in a logical and efficient manner in line with the companyGraduation data for modelling and comparing different transport optionsSetting up a logical system that includesA way to keep track of outgoing materialQuality control of the outgoing materialChecking contracts and paperwork and help setting up a way to deal with the transport of the materialStoring data relevant in an orderly manner so it is accessible remotelyAbout Waste4ME BVThe company Waste4ME positions itself at the intersection of different industries Waste4ME is pioneering the plastic recycling industry by giving previously incinerated plastic waste a second life Our company turns a global environmental problem into lowcarbon products and valuable petrochemical products Our solution also allows implementing sustainable waste disposal techniques and bridge intermittent energy supply in remote locations WER unit waste reducer energy generator is a mobile waste management tool based on pyrolysis technology It is designed for tackling waste, where recycling is not feasible and where waste disposal is an issue Thanks to its mobile nature, WER allows to avoid transport costs, The pollution of the environment with microplastics is a direct consequence of the enormous quantities of plastics we produce and use in our modern society Part of this eventually ends up in the environment In order to take effective measures, insight is required, on the one hand, into the production, use and disposal processes whereby plastics are released and, on the other hand, into the processes that lead to the dispersion and accumulation of plastics in the environment The aim of the OU MinPlas project is to map out these individual processes for a number of important plastic sources integrally by means of modelling These include, for example, wear and tear of car tyres, plastic granules and textile fibres In collaboration with stakeholders, we will then look at how the relevant production, use and waste disposal processes for the selected plastic sources can be adapted to reduce plastic pollution Essential aspects of this research are 1 mapping of relevant production, use and disposal processes for the selected plastic sources, 2 modelling of the behaviour of microplastics in the environment, and 3 collaboration with stakeholders, , , , , , , , The salary is  23955, gross per month in the first year for a full time appointment, , The Open Universiteit provides good secondary benefits such as training, mobility, parttime employment and paid parental leave, , , , 38 hours per week, , , , Postbus 2960

Job Title: Research and Education Assistant in Material Engineering and Mechatronics
Job Description: Job Description, , The research group Discrete Technology  Production Automation DTPA has a vacancy for a Research and Education assistant who will support both the teaching and research activities in the DTPA research group, as well as, in the educational programmes of Industrial Engineering and Management IEM and Mechanical Engineering ME This includes technical support for PhD students and postdoc staff from both research groups and supervision of both bachelor and master students from IEM and ME, , Main activities, , , In particular, you will, , , , , , Organisation, , Since its foundation in 1614, the University of Groningen has enjoyed an international reputation as a dynamic and innovative centre of higher education offering highquality teaching and research Study and career paths in a wide variety of disciplines encourage currently more than 33,500 students and researchers to develop their individual talents Belonging to the best research universities in Europe, the top 100 universities in the world and joining forces with prestigious partner universities and networks, the University of Groningen is truly an international place of knowledge, , Within the Faculty of Science and Engineering FSE, the Engineering and Technology institute Groningen ENTEG   conducts engineering science research and covers a broad area of mechanical engineering, electrical engineering, materials engineering, chemical engineering, biotechnology and information technology The research unit Discrete Technology and Production Automation is focused on the dynamical modeling, analysis and systems engineering of complex electromechanical systems and multidisciplinary material science The application areas include MEMSNEMS, mechatronic and robotic systems, flexible electronics, development of sensors and actuators, as well as smart energy systems, , We offer you in accordance with the Collective Labour Agreement for Dutch Universities

Job description About the role As the Chief Financial Officer CFO, you will be the senior executive responsible for managing the financial actions of Rockstart, its investor funds and its subsidiaries In the position of CFO you are the financial conscience of the organization and part of the management team of Rockstart, currently consisting of an operations director, commercial director, fund directors and finance manager Functionally you will report to the shareholders Your main role is to accelerate the professionalisation of Rockstarts financial back office, forecasting and investor reporting You will have the responsibility to financially manage Rockstarts entrepreneurial ambitions to further grow its assets under management by 40 million within two years and balance this with the requirements of Rockstarts current LPs such as pension funds who demand industry standard reporting, forecasting and dealmaking and MA This requires you to apply your extensive knowledge and experience to deeply understand the companys financial position, communicate with various stakeholders and oversee all the financial operations of the organisation, including accounting, financial reporting, tax, business control, legal, and treasury   About You The perfect candidate is someone who knows how to work in a fastpace environment, is not afraid to roll up their sleeves to get a deep understanding of the Rockstart business and see where they can improve processes, but also moves quickly to a level where they can focus on the key strategic financial goals of the organisation and helps to elevate and grow the skills of the people in the team Above all else you are honest, trustworthy and high in integrity You function in an entrepreneurial environment and in a small organization with short communication lines You are the end responsible finance professional with the helicopter view and at the same time hands on when needed You have a proactive personality and a can do mentality This describes you well

The pollution of the environment with microplastics is a direct consequence of the enormous quantities of plastics we produce and use in our modern society Part of this eventually ends up in the environment In order to take effective measures, insight is required, on the one hand, into the production, use and disposal processes whereby plastics are released and, on the other hand, into the processes that lead to the dispersion and accumulation of plastics in the environment The aim of the OU MinPlas project is to map out these individual processes for a number of important plastic sources integrally by means of modelling These include, for example, wear and tear of car tyres, plastic granules and textile fibres In collaboration with stakeholders, we will then look at how the relevant production, use and waste disposal processes for the selected plastic sources can be adapted to reduce plastic pollution Essential aspects of this research are 1 mapping of relevant production, use and disposal processes for the selected plastic sources, 2 modelling of the behaviour of microplastics in the environment, and 3 collaboration with stakeholders, , , , , , , , The salary is  23955, gross per month in the first year for a full time appointment, , The Open Universiteit provides good secondary benefits such as training, mobility, parttime employment and paid parental leave
